mapper.update: update app_rpt_profit_and_loss set rpt_profit_and_loss_id = #{rptProfitAndLossId}, rpt_profit_and_loss_name = #{rptProfitAndLossName}, department_from = #{departmentFrom}, department_to = #{departmentTo}, currency_id = #{currencyId}, revenue = #{revenue}, revenue_expenditure = #{revenueExpenditure}, gross_margin = #{grossMargin}, operational_expenditure = #{operationalExpenditure}, operating_profit = #{operatingProfit}, other_revenue = #{otherRevenue}, other_expenditure = #{otherExpenditure}, net_profit = #{netProfit}, comparative_revenue = #{comparativeRevenue}, comparative_revenue_expenditure = #{comparativeRevenueExpenditure}, comparative_gross_margin = #{comparativeGrossMargin}, comparative_operational_expenditure = #{comparativeOperationalExpenditure}, comparative_operating_profit = #{comparativeOperatingProfit}, comparative_other_revenue = #{comparativeOtherRevenue}, comparative_other_expenditure = #{comparativeOtherExpenditure}, comparative_net_profit = #{comparativeNetProfit}, date_created = #{dateCreated}, created_by = #{createdBy} where rpt_profit_and_loss_id = #{rptProfitAndLossId};
